CustomField.description: Use the criteria numbers along with boolean operators 'AND' and 'OR' to define the statement, e.g. 1 AND (2 OR 3)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the criteria numbers along with boolean operators 'AND' and 'OR' to define the statement, e.g. 1 AND (2 OR 3)
CustomField.label: Criteria Logic
